translation.en: Dear Diary...
go fuck yourself.
Just kidding. I don't know what to write in this stupid thing.
translation.ja: 冗談だよ 書くことに困っただけ

translation.en: Anyway, hi.
translation.ja: とにかく よろしく

translation.en: My name is Sydney.
I'm a boring 17- year- old white girl.
I'm not special, is what I'm trying to say, and I'm okay with that.
translation.ja: 何も特別じゃないけど 別に構わない

translation.en: - ♪ I'm not like everybody else ♪ - We moved to Pennsylvania two years ago.
translation.ja: ２年前に ペンシルべニアに来た

translation.en: And not, like, a cute part of Pennsylvania either, but corn and cabbage and shit.
translation.ja: 名産品すらない つまらない地域だ

translation.en: Like, my town's won the grand prize for most polluted air in America for a bunch of years in a row now, so...
translation.ja: 大気汚染度 全米第１位に 何年も連続で選ばれてる町

translation.en: - ♪ 'Cause I'm not like everybody else ♪ - ...yippee.
Ms. Cappriotti made me promise to do this.
Promise you'll do this.
She said it might help with my moods.
It might help with your moods.
I keep losing my temper.
- ♪ Like everybody else ♪ - I don't want to, but it just spills out.
translation.ja: 自分でも止められない

translation.en: It's 'cause my dad sort of died... last spring.
translation.ja: 春にパパが死んだせいかも

translation.en: So I'm supposed to write... what, now? I don't get it.
Anything. Everything. Whatever comes to mind.
translation.ja: 心に浮かんだことは 全部 書くの

translation.en: And now no one knows what to say to me.
Think of it like you're just talking to yourself and no one will ever read it but you.
translation.ja: 誰にも読ませなくていい 自分との対話よ

translation.en: Not even the guidance counselor.
translation.ja: カウンセラーもお手上げ

translation.en: Can I just... use my phone?
Hmm... Your phone'll be distracting. Don't you think?
translation.ja: スマホだと気が散るでしょ？

translation.en: I'd like you to have something a little more... therapeutic.
translation.ja: セラピーとして 取り組んでほしいの

translation.en: These things are never easy, but I do want you to at least attempt
translation.ja: 難しいとは思うけど 努力してみて

translation.en: to have a normal high school experience.
translation.ja: 普通の高校生活を 体験するために

translation.en: I mean, she's pretty all right, I guess.
translation.ja: 先生は悪い人じゃない

translation.en: Even if she does smell like an old hippie.
Anyway, here's to a normal high school experience,
translation.ja: “普通の高校生活”  バンザイ

translation.en: whatever the fuck that means.
And yes, during arousal, there is an increase in all sorts of things,
translation.ja: 勃起中は さまざまな物が 増大する

translation.en: including adrenaline and, of course, blood flow,
translation.ja: アドレナリンや血流など

translation.en: and the blood flow continues down
translation.ja: 血は陰茎海綿体に流れ そこに留まる

translation.en: and then gets trapped within the corpora cavernosa.
translation.ja: 血は陰茎海綿体に流れ そこに留まる 血は陰茎海綿体に流れ そこに留まる 〝性教育〞

translation.en: The penis expands, and this is how the Homo sapien male
translation.ja: 〝性教育〞 ホモサピエンスの男性が 勃起を維持する仕組みだ

translation.en: is able to hold an erection.
translation.ja: ホモサピエンスの男性が 勃起を維持する仕組みだ

translation.en: Yes.
From my experience, Mr. File,
the holding of an erection is far more successful in the hands of a Homo sapien female.
translation.ja: 勃起を維持するのは 女性の方が得意かと

translation.en: Very funny, Mr. Lewis.
Just talkin' science.
Moving on.
When a female gets sexually excited, there is also increased blood flow
translation.ja: 女性が興奮した時も 血流は生殖器へ…

translation.en: - to the genitals... - Ah. Oh, come on, fire crotch.
translation.ja: 女性が興奮した時も 血流は生殖器へ… 笑えよ 赤陰毛ちゃん 面白いだろ

translation.en: - Laugh. That was funny. - ...proceeds to swell.
translation.ja: 笑えよ 赤陰毛ちゃん 面白いだろ

translation.en: Why is all this happening?
- - Your scrotum looks different than others. That's an asymmetrical scrotum.
translation.ja: 陰嚢(いんのう)のサイズが違うのは…

translation.en: - My best friend is Dina. - Having one is not at all unusual.
She's such a badass.
Normally, I don't think she'd choose me as a friend, but we both moved here around the same time.
translation.ja: 普通ならディナは 私に見向きもしないと思う

translation.en: Both the new kids in town, you know, so, guess I kinda lucked out.
translation.ja: 転入が同時期だったから 仲良くなれた

translation.en: Before Dina, I mostly just kept to myself.
translation.ja: それまで私は孤独だった

translation.en: I'm not the kind of person that likes attention, really,
translation.ja: 注目されるのは苦手だから

translation.en: but she has this way about her that... she just makes me feel different.
translation.ja: でもディナといると 私は変われる

translation.en: She was with me when I found out about my dad.
Okay. You ready?
- She held my hand. - One, two... We cried.
translation.ja: 手を握って 一緒に泣いてくれた

translation.en: And now, since then, she keeps me laughing when all I wanna do is melt into the floor.
translation.ja: どこかに消えちゃいたい時も ディナは笑わせてくれる

translation.en: Which sort of made me realize I've never had a best friend before.
translation.ja: よく考えたら 親友なんて初めてだ

translation.en: - ♪ And then I ♪ - ♪ And I want it ♪ - ♪ Yes, I do ♪ - ♪ Yes, I do ♪
So, I'm standing there, trying to get by, and he's all like,
translation.ja: 私は黙ってたけど… “どの子が転校生？”って 彼が聞いてきたの

translation.en: Oh, who's the new girl in town? And I'm like, Shut up. It's me, Dina.
translation.ja: “どの子が転校生？”って 彼が聞いてきたの

translation.en: Wait, this is Brad... Lewis?
translation.ja: 彼ってブラッド･ルイス？

translation.en: Yeah.
He's sort of sweet, you know?
And then he asked me to homecoming.
translation.ja: ホームカミングにも誘われた

translation.en: Wait, and... and you accepted?
No. I told him to take his washboard abs and chiseled jawline and get out of my face.
translation.ja: “彫刻のような腹筋とアゴを 捨てて出直せ”と答えた

translation.en: Yeah, of course I said yes.
translation.ja: ウソ 当然オーケー

translation.en: Uh-- Oh, my God. You had sex with him, didn't you?
- - Holy shit. No way! Holy shit!
translation.ja: ウソでしょ ありえない

translation.en: You gave Bradley Lewis your V- card?
- Tell me he used a condom, because-- - Yes, of course.
translation.ja: ゴムは使った？ もちろん

translation.en: Dina just got her braces off, and her boobs suddenly arrived.
translation.ja: 矯正器具が取れ 胸が膨らんだディナは

translation.en: So, of course, golden boy Bradley Lewis takes notice.
translation.ja: 矯正器具が取れ 胸が膨らんだディナは 学校の人気者に 目をつけられた

translation.en: So, what, are you guys, like, suddenly girlfriend and boyfriend or something?
translation.ja: それで恋人になっちゃった？

translation.en: I mean, we haven't put a label on it yet, but...
translation.ja: それはハッキリさせてない

translation.en: I really like him, okay?
This is the worst.
Yeah. Oh, yeah. No. Sure, I get it.
Just give him a chance.
Oh, come on, there's gotta be someone you sort of like. Just a little.
translation.ja: シドニーも気になる男子とか いるでしょ？

translation.en: I don't know. I just guess I haven't really thought about it.
translation.ja: さあ 考えたことない

translation.en: Well, think about it.
And then maybe we can all go to homecoming together, like a double date thing.
translation.ja: ホームカミングで ダブルデートしよう

translation.en: - Hey, babe. - Hey!
translation.ja: ベイビー ブラッド

translation.en: Sorry I'm late.
- All good, babe. -
Ugh. They both call each other babe. Kill me right now.
translation.ja: “ベイビー”だって 勘弁して

translation.en: Hey, Syd.
Bradley.
Do you think your mom could hook us up with some burgers? They're just so great here.
translation.ja: 君のママに バーガーをもらえるかな？

translation.en: Huh. She's not working today.
I was just asking.
Okay.
Want a burger, Brad? Let's get a burger. I've got some cash.
translation.ja: 今日はお金あるよ 注文しよう

translation.en: - Yeah? - Yeah.
- Wanna share one, babe? - Yeah. Oh, ketchup.
translation.ja: シェアする？ ソースがない

translation.en: Help yourself.
So...
Dina's just great, isn't she?
Jesus, do you ever smile?
Not today.
So, what have we decided?
Whatever you want, babe.
- Please. Please stop. - You gotta try one of these fries.
translation.ja: お願いだから 黙れ

translation.en: - I wish you would just stop talking. -
Wipe that smug smile off his stupid, stupid face.
translation.ja: そのニヤニヤ笑いをやめろ

translation.en: - Oh, shit. - Oh, my God.
Oh, fuck.
- Are you okay? - Wait. What?
Yeah, fine. Just give me a minute.
- Take a tissue. - Gimme a minute, all right?
So, here's the deal.
Today, I almost convinced myself that I made Bradley Lewis's nose bleed
translation.ja: 今日 私は念力で 鼻血を出させた

translation.en: with my mind.
Right.
Mostly, I just need to chill out more.
I am not losing my first and only very best friend ever.
translation.ja: 親友を失ったわけじゃない

translation.en: I'm happy for Dina, and if dating Bradley Dickhead Lewis makes her happy,
translation.ja: あのクソ男といて ディナが幸せなら―

translation.en: then I guess I'm okay with it.
Oh, hey, Syd!
Hey.
Stanley Barber. He lives down the street from me.
translation.ja: 近所に住む スタンリー･バーバーだ

translation.en: Where I feel shitty about basically everything about myself,
translation.ja: 私は何にでもキレるけど―

translation.en: Stan is the master of zero fucks.
translation.ja: 彼は いつも悩みゼロ

translation.en: Oh, my leg fell asleep. One sec.
Can I walk with you?
Sure. Why not?
Cool.
Cool.
Stan is kind of... weird.
You okay?
Shoes. Who needs 'em?
Uh... so, Bloodwitch, am I right?
translation.ja: “血の魔女(ブラッド･ウィッチ)”は？

translation.en: What?
Bloodwitch. You like their music?
That's a... terrible name for a band.
Nah. Perfect.
translation.ja: いや 最高の名前だよ

translation.en: Bet they sound like shit.
Well, I mean, I have-- I have 'em on vinyl...
limited edition, gatefold and stuff,
if you wanna... come over, and we can listen sometime.
translation.ja: 僕の家に来れば一緒に聞ける

translation.en: Oh.
We can get high.
I have never been high before.
translation.ja: ハイになった経験はない

translation.en: Yeah, maybe.
I mean, you don't have to. I was-- I was just, you know...
translation.ja: 無理に誘う気はないけど…

translation.en: We-- You know, we live so close, and we've never really hung out before.
translation.ja: 近所なのに 遊んだことがないから

translation.en: Uh, no, I guess we haven't.
But, yeah. Uh, maybe we should.
Yeah.
Cool. Uh...
Let me know.
What a world we live in, Sydney.
I live with my mom and little brother.
Sydney! Is that you?
Mom and I haven't been getting along lately.
translation.ja: 最近ママとは仲が悪い

translation.en: Nope. It's an axe murderer. Good thing you asked.
translation.ja: いや 殺人鬼が帰ってきた

translation.en: Ha- ha! Very funny.
translation.ja: はいはい 面白いわね

translation.en: Hey. So apparently, Karen's dog ran through a screen door or something,
translation.ja: カレンの犬が脱走して ケガしたらしくて

translation.en: so she had to go to an emergency vet.
- Okay. - So I'm gonna pick up her shift tonight,
translation.ja: へえ だから今夜はシフトを代わる 彼女には借りがあるし

translation.en: which is fine 'cause I owe her two shifts from the time Liam ate all that cheese.
translation.ja: だから今夜はシフトを代わる 彼女には借りがあるし

translation.en: Well, thanks for telling me your life story, Mom.
translation.ja: 壮大な物語をありがとう

translation.en: No. Wait, come back here. I'm not done yet. Eyes on me.
translation.ja: 待って 話は終わってない

translation.en: Okay. Question. Big question.
Have you seen my stockings? They were in the bathroom. They were hanging over the shower curtain?
translation.ja: 浴室に干してた ストッキングを知らない？

translation.en: Oh, sorry. I thought they were dirty.
- No, they were drying. - Well, I found them in the bathtub.
translation.ja: 干してた 浴槽に落ちてた

translation.en: D-- Well, where are they? They're my last pair.
I sort of...
washed 'em.
Wait. In the washer?
Yeah, and I guess they sort of ended up in the dryer, so...
translation.ja: 今は乾燥機の中だと思うよ

translation.en: Oh, great.
Now I get to feel like sausage while I'm serving it.
translation.ja: ソーセージの気分で働ける

translation.en: You don't really have to wear 'em, do you? No one wears 'em anymore. - Like, since the '90s. - Can you--
translation.ja: 今どき ストッキングなんて 履く必要ある？

translation.en: Can you just make sure that Liam does his homework and eats some dinner?
translation.ja: リアムの宿題と夕飯の 面倒を見て

translation.en: Isn't he old enough to make sure himself?
translation.ja: 自分で できるでしょ

translation.en: Sydney, can you just do something for me, anything, just once, without questioning?
translation.ja: たまには口答えせずに 協力してくれる？

translation.en: Here I thought I was being so charming.
translation.ja: 生意気さが魅力だから

translation.en: Nope. Not even a little bit.
translation.ja: 全然 そんなことない

translation.en: Really doesn't matter what we're talking about.
- - Mom and I could sit in silence
translation.ja: 話す内容は関係ない お互い何も言わなくても そばにいるとイライラする

translation.en: for the rest of our lives, and she'd still annoy the crap out of me.
translation.ja: お互い何も言わなくても そばにいるとイライラする

translation.en: Hey, Goob. Done your homework yet?
translation.ja: リアム 宿題は やった？

translation.en: Hours ago. Soon as I got home. What about you?
translation.ja: とっくに終わらせた 姉ちゃんは？

translation.en: Uh... I'll get to it.
Come on, Syd. Mom says you have to work hard if you're gonna succeed.
translation.ja: “成功には努力が必要”と ママが言ってたよ

translation.en: Yeah, well, the plan's always been for me to sit back and watch you succeed, Goob.
translation.ja: リアムが成功するのを 見守る予定だから

translation.en: Oh, hey, who knows? Maybe one day, if you really work hard enough,
you get to be the one to pay for my funeral.
- How was school today? - Well, um...
translation.ja: 学校は どう？ 今日は…

translation.en: Richard Rynard punched Toby Gardner in the face, and he got sent to Mr. Coffee's office.
translation.ja: リチャードがトビーを殴って 校長室に呼ばれた

translation.en: Oh, yeah?
Yup, and I think I might be next, so... I'm devising a plan. Check it out.
translation.ja: 僕が次の標的になった時の 計画を立ててる

translation.en: Holy shit, Goob. Is that for you?
Yup. Designed it myself.
Breastplate, shin guards, spiked gloves...
translation.ja: プロテクターと トゲ付きグローブ

translation.en: But I'm not so sure about the helmet situation just yet,
translation.ja: プロテクターと トゲ付きグローブ 視野が狭くなるから ヘルメットは迷い中

translation.en: 'cause I don't wanna block my peripherals, you know, just in case.
translation.ja: 視野が狭くなるから ヘルメットは迷い中

translation.en: It's really cool, man. It's some of your best work yet.
translation.ja: イケてる 傑作じゃない？

translation.en: Yeah, it's basically my Mark One, and the first suit's always the hardest to design, so it's still a work in progress.
translation.ja: それは一号機だから まだ試行錯誤中だ

translation.en: And, sorry, what was the plan again?
Well, I'm gonna build the suit and kick Richard Rynard's ass.
translation.ja: このスーツで彼をやっつける

translation.en: Oh. Vengeance. Got it.
My family.
I guess we've never had a lot of money.
translation.ja: 裕福には ほど遠い

translation.en: Like, every place we moved, and we've moved a lot, it's always some place like this.
translation.ja: しょっちゅう引っ越すけど いつも こんな田舎だ

translation.en: It's like a lottery, I guess.
Some kids win big time the moment they're born.
translation.ja: 生まれながら 大当たりの子もいる

translation.en: The rest of us,
we're all stuck with scratch- offs and bottle caps and shit.
translation.ja: スクラッチを 硬貨で削り続ける人生だ

translation.en: - ♪ To destroy that feeling ♪ - Liam?
Yeah?
If Richard Rynard ever touches you... before you get your suit built to kick his ass,
translation.ja: スーツの完成前に リチャードが何かしてきたら―

translation.en: I'll pull his throat out... with my bare hands right in front of Mr. Coffee.
translation.ja: 校長の目の前で 彼の喉を潰してあげる

translation.en: Really?
Yeah. Yeah, like this.
- You are so weird. -
Yeah, I know.
Okay, so... confession.
I started getting these zits on my thighs.
translation.ja: 太ももにニキビができた

translation.en: - I am straight up disgusting. -
I've tried zit cream and soap and all sorts of junk. Nothing helps.
translation.ja: 塗り薬やら何やら試したけど 全部 効果なし

translation.en: - They're not even that fun to pop. -
Stop!
It's probably just puberty.
I don't know.
So, Stanley Barber texted me. - He made me listen to Bloodwitch. -
translation.ja: スタンは例の曲を送ってきた

translation.en: Sometimes at night, I want to touch myself,
translation.ja: オナニーしたいと 思う夜もある

translation.en: but I don't.
Peanut butter helps.
The later Mom gets home, the more wine she drinks.
translation.ja: 帰宅が遅いと ママは酒をよく飲む

translation.en: What are we watching?
Don't know.
We haven't talked about Dad since he killed himself in the basement.
translation.ja: 死んでから パパの話はしてない

translation.en: AC's broken.
The unit's probably just... overheated.
translation.ja: 室外機に 熱が こもってるんでしょ

translation.en: It's hot as balls in this house.
Open a window.
It's that heavy thing we're all too afraid to talk about.
translation.ja: 話すのが怖くて みんなで避けてる

translation.en: I got called in... to the counselor's office.
translation.ja: カウンセリング室に 呼び出された

translation.en: - Why? What did-- what did you do? - Nothing.
translation.ja: 何をしたの？ 別に何も

translation.en: She just...
She wants me to have, like... an outlet or something.
translation.ja: 言葉にするべきだと言われた

translation.en: An outlet for what?
Just, sometimes it feels like...
the people I love don't love me back.
translation.ja: 愛されてないかもって

translation.en: Well...
Maybe you're aiming too high, hon.
translation.ja: 求めすぎなんじゃない？

translation.en: She's such a bitch sometimes.
translation.ja: ママは時々 嫌な女だ

translation.en: Dad would have understood, but he hung himself, so I guess I'm on my own.
translation.ja: パパは話が通じたけど 自殺したから私は孤独だ

translation.en: Sometimes I wonder why he did it, and why we never talk about it...
translation.ja: なぜ自殺したのか なぜ私たちは言及しないのか

translation.en: ...and what the hell is going on with me.
Why sometimes I feel like I'm boiling inside.
translation.ja: 体が燃えるような感覚は なぜ？

translation.en: 'Cause maybe...
...I am way more fucked up than I thought.
translation.ja: 思ったよりヤバいかも
